name: Thoughtful Reviews
text: Carryout location with friendly counter staff. Clean take-out counter and pick-up area and there is plenty of parking in the lot. They accept call-in as well as in-person counter orders and offer special pizza deals. Food is fresh and affordably priced. Nothing fancy here but consistent great tasting pizza.

name: ARIN OTUKS
text: Poor customer service and pizza advertised as extra most bestest is not $6 in New York and New Jersey is $7.48. And it‚Äôs not hot and ready had to wait over 10 mins

name: Michelle Milner
text: I don't really think the place is very clean as everyone else does. It smells like mold, not pizza. Also, have been trying to order online. The website lets me make selections but doesn't advance so I can place the actual order. Been trying ‚Ä¶More

name: Barbara Cole
text: This is by far not my favorite pizza - way too much crust and not enough cheese or toppings - but - You CANNOT get a better deal, and usually there are plenty of the hot and ready waiting.  So - no complaints!  If i wanted an amazing ‚Ä¶More

name: Omar Haider
text: Clean, convenient place with good service. Unfortunately, the deep dish pizza I tried was one of the worst pizzas I have ever had. The dough was not good. Not sure about other pizzas. Seemed like a popular place with a lot of customers on a weeknight.

name: William Mild
text: Hungry for a Michigan-style pizza?  Then look no further than Little Caesars.  Good deep dish.  The price is right, but they charge for dipping sauce.

name: Nicholas Araya
text: Fast service, good for what you pay and overall awesome job all in all

name: Thomas Nee
text: Went there today 10/2/2018 for lunch at 12:40. The doors were locked and no lights were on. Not the first time. The commercials say $5 pizza or $9 special and their prices are always a couple of $$ higher

name: Charisse Dean
text: Hot and Ready is never ready but it's hot when you finally get it. Not the best pizza but the closest I can get to a "Detroit Style" pizza. Also... They changed their hours during the week they're only open until 9. üëé

name: Michael Cheretes
text: The worst customer service experience I have ever had! I ordered over the phone for pickup and I was there in 20min even though they said it would be ready in 15 min. When I get there it wasnt ready  The kid behind the counter shrugs his shoulder and says what do you want from me....

name: Tim Beatty
text: I like the pizza.  Sauce doesn't taste like crap like Domino's. Cheap $6 pep or cheese.  Deep dish is great.  Usually have the hot n ready actually ready. ‚Ä¶More

name: Steven Hess
text: Simply this: For what you get, the price is excellent and fast.

name: Sidhant Bakhru
text: Love their Deep Deep Dish cheese pizza. Always hot and ready, and I'm in and out within a minute!

name: dijah and dia
text: There the the best i wish they will never shut down

text: always ready no waiting.. surprised with $5 cheese pizza tasted so good.

text: EXTRAMOSTBESTEST pepperoni pizza  is far from being that. Very dissappointing...not worth spending the EXTRA $

text: The location is very convenient, and the new stuffed pepperoni crust pizza is amazing!

name: Helen Holton
text: Service can be slow the don't seem to have the hot and ready pizzas ready don't know why. The staff is really friendly though.

name: Portgas
text: You never pick up the phone and on your calendar it says you are open but when i go to the store its close and this is the second time

name: Rich Ashley
text: Posted hours say 11am-9pm. Why is it closed at 3:00pm on a Monday with no sign or anything explaining any exigent circumstances Etc.

name: Kimberly Vega
text: Deep dish is awesome, so are their cheese bread! Just wish they could deliver I'd order everyday.

name: Hensley Cansler
text: Store was closed over an hour before the scheduled time.

text: Door says opens at 11. I get there at 12 and its closed. First time i thought maybe an employee was late. But trying to go there 4 times and still closed at 12 is a joke.
